title: Bi-Weekly Music Discussion Thread
selftext:
What is r/India listening to? Share and discuss songs, playlists, artists, or anything music-related here!

If you're a musician yourself, please share your work so we can all hear what up-and-coming musicians are doing these days.

Don't just mention stuff, link it! Links that are official and provided by the artists themselves are preferred.

**Music Thread is posted every two weeks on Tuesday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Bi-Weekly+Music+Discussion+Thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/06d0xwq1x8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=4195dbb767ebd70a3209ea46a4497062e788c176
comments:
I'm listening to Sar Phira by Hasan Raheem. 
It's a pretty chill song for easy listening.

https://youtu.be/B9EKumdY4EQ

Listening to this Madno song right now! Kinda addicted.

The song, "naam Heena likhna" from the  movie "Yahaan" is equally soothing and well complimented by its cinematography.  Minissha lamba and Jimmy made a lovely couple.

Edit: corrections
I think you are talking about a separate movie? Ye Lamhaa movie mein toh Bipasha, Sanjay Dutt, and Kunal Kapoor they.
You are correct. I got confused between the two.

[This cover](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ObXS-BtiFfc) of Travis' 'Why does it always rain on me?' by Assam band Bottle Rockets. Trivia - the singer is the lead guy from the acclaimed Assamese movie 'Aamis'.

['Two Hands' by Big Thief](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eElc7PX63xQ), which I discovered while watching Mare of Easttown. Amazing miniseries btw.

'[Rewind' by Neel & The Lightbulbs](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g8jAgZP21L4), a Calcutta band. The simple video really captures the typical house party scene with friends.

['St. Valentines Day Blues'](https://open.spotify.com/track/1kzoqKNuO6NdPErmGP8OOE?si=2733a456da8246ec), an instrumental by Blues band Soulmate. It's very unlike their usual songs which usually have power vocals and blues heavy riffs. This one's a soothing acoustic melody.
Ponniyin Selvam album. A.R.Rahman. ‚ô•Ô∏èü•∫
Filhaal by Towers is a mellow track. Does anyone  listen to Lifafa, would love to know which songs of his you enjoy the most.
How did you guys like the lollapalooza India lineup revealed today?
Bro not upto the level i felt. I am hoping there is one more lineup drop or something.

How much were lolla early bird tickets?

General or VIP
I was rooting for some coke studio artists but they were probably afraid of getting Pakistanis to perform.
A lot of rumoured people are not there in the list too bro, like red hot chilli peppers etc. not much of a rock fan, but i am hoping for another surprise drop or something ü§û
Currently streaming DDLJ album :>
Going for the Strokes. Rest of the lineup was meh.
Any suggestions for modern singers but like classic 70 80s rock like billy idol.
Just discovered Melody Gardot, amazing vocals.
Heard fujii kaze shinunoga e-wa. It's pretty nice song.
Nikamma is OG. Wahin ka wahin is nice

RajmaChawal by Baba Sehgal

Din me bana ho raat me kha lo

Deep meaning

din ho yo rat.. 

https://ragya.com
with beautiful background..
I love nikamma it's definitely one of his best works. Chaku chidiya is another good one. I'll listen to the one you recommended, haven't heard it yet. Thanks üôÇ

My [Punjabi Top Hits playlist on Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/playlist/3lot3HM1GHmXDzJFt1cjTb). I have added all Best Punjabi songs that are hot and trending. [https://open.spotify.com/playlist/3lot3HM1GHmXDzJFt1cjTb](https://open.spotify.com/playlist/3lot3HM1GHmXDzJFt1cjTb)

I update it regularly with all best tracks I see on Instagram reels, Youtube and New releases chart. Do let me know what you think about these songs and Artists.

[Punjabi Evergreen Popular hits](https://open.spotify.com/playlist/1EP8oqSfTMxhK7YchdqF4m) \- Best Punjabi Tracks of all time for chillax, party, vibes and road trips.

I spend my childhood listening to these tracks, vibing on them with my school friends, watching these music videos on MTV and channel V and sharing these songs in 512MB memory card & Bluetooth. Gives me Nostalgia Vibes and Goosebumps every time I listen to it.

Pretty sure these tracks will not go out of fashion even after 10-20 years from now.  
Which Punjabi Songs is your favorite? Let me know what good tracks I'm still missing.  
https://open.spotify.com/playlist/1EP8oqSfTMxhK7YchdqF4m

It's Kool!
Honestly, I'm not a fan of Punjabi Music but these all are catchy and famous tracks. Loved it _/\_

Best Bollywood/Hindi Party Hits:
https://open.spotify.com/playlist/6akWA6j0WMB9i2fxmWe0QW

Best English Party Beats / All Time Top Hit:
https://open.spotify.com/playlist/5zvUHAQ7AvwQdaDBC1LYkH

Songs I'm prepared to hear on my last day on earth - [Can I request you to play these songs when I'm at the Pearly gates?](https://open.spotify.com/playlist/0ROzSphqolo5QnpnYT5q71?si=3c731226b96646b5)

Currently I‚Äôm listening to this - https://youtu.be/88niTyTD1BM

Very good song
Man, it feels like a joke.. Sunburn has a wayyy better lineup TBH
Any progressive metal fans? Surprisingly little known band from Goa  [Within Ceres - Skyless](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rQ8ejCkmxxI)
